description: Detects use of chcp to look up the system locale value as part of host discovery
name: CHCP CodePage Locale Lookup
query: (process.parent.executable:*\\cmd.exe AND process.parent.command_line:*\ \/c\ * AND process.executable:*\\chcp.com AND process.command_line:(*chcp OR *chcp\  OR *chcp\ \ ))
author: _pete_0
